name: Feature 48
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign width = section.settings.width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius  
  assign background_style = section.settings.background_style

  assign feature_bg_type = section.settings.feature_bg_type
  assign feature_bg_overlay = section.settings.feature_bg_overlay
  assign feature_bg_overlay_color = section.settings.feature_bg_overlay_color
  assign bg_image = section.settings.bg_image
  assign bg_image_mobile = section.settings.bg_image_mobile

  assign content_align = section.settings.content_align
  assign content_align_mobile = section.settings.content_align_mobile
  assign sticker_animation = section.settings.sticker_animation

  assign features_gap = section.settings.features_gap
  assign features_gap_mobile = section.settings.features_gap_mobile
  assign features_mt = section.settings.features_mt
  assign features_mt_mobile = section.settings.features_mt_mobile
  assign use_slider_mobile = section.settings.use_slider_mobile
  assign cards_per_row = section.settings.cards_per_row

  assign content_horizontal_align = ""
  if content_align == "center"
    assign content_horizontal_align = "center"
  elsif content_align == "right"
    assign content_horizontal_align = "end"
  else
    assign content_horizontal_align = "start"
  endif

  assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = ""
  if content_align_mobile == "center"
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "center"
  elsif content_align_mobile == "right"
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "end"
  else
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "start"
  endif

  assign feature_padding_vertical = section.settings.feature_padding_vertical
  assign feature_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.feature_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign feature_padding_horizontal = section.settings.feature_padding_horizontal
  assign feature_bg_color = section.settings.feature_bg_color
  assign feature_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.feature_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign feature_radius = section.settings.feature_radius
  assign feature_border_thickness = section.settings.feature_border_thickness
  assign feature_border_color = section.settings.feature_border_color
  assign feature_align = section.settings.feature_align
  assign feature_align_mobile = section.settings.feature_align_mobile
  assign feature_shadow_color = section.settings.feature_shadow_color
  assign use_feature_effect = section.settings.use_feature_effect

  assign feature_horizontal_align = ""
  if feature_align == "center"
    assign feature_horizontal_align = "center"
  elsif feature_align == "right"
    assign feature_horizontal_align = "end"
  else
    assign feature_horizontal_align = "start"
  endif

  assign feature_horizontal_align_mobile = ""
  if feature_align_mobile == "center"
    assign feature_horizontal_align_mobile = "center"
  elsif feature_align_mobile == "right"
    assign feature_horizontal_align_mobile = "end"
  else
    assign feature_horizontal_align_mobile = "start"
  endif

  assign title_custom = section.settings.title_custom
  assign title_font = section.settings.title_font
  assign title_size = section.settings.title_size
  assign title_size_mobile = section.settings.title_size_mobile
  assign title_height = section.settings.title_height
  assign title_color = section.settings.title_color

  assign text_custom = section.settings.text_custom
  assign text_font = section.settings.text_font
  assign text_size = section.settings.text_size
  assign text_size_mobile = section.settings.text_size_mobile
  assign text_height = section.settings.text_height
  assign text_color = section.settings.text_color
  assign text_mt = section.settings.text_mt
  assign text_mt_mobile = section.settings.text_mt_mobile

  assign image = section.settings.image
  assign image_border_thickness = section.settings.image_border_thickness
  assign image_border_color = section.settings.image_border_color
  assign image_radius = section.settings.image_radius
  assign image_ratio = section.settings.image_ratio
  assign image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.image_ratio_mobile

  assign dots_mt = section.settings.dots_mt
  assign dots_size_mobile = section.settings.dots_size_mobile
  assign dots_show_mobile = section.settings.dots_show_mobile
  assign dots_color = section.settings.dots_color

  assign loading_attribute = 'eager'
  if lazy
    assign loading_attribute = 'lazy'
  endif 
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{ title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
    position: relative;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;    
  }

  .feature-content-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: {{ content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
  }

  .feature-bg-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    z-index: 1;
  }

  .feature-feature-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
  }

  .feature-bg-{{ section.id }} img,
  .feature-bg-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .feature-bg-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .feature-bg-{{ section.id }}:after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background-color: {{ feature_bg_overlay_color | hex_to_rgba: feature_bg_overlay }};
  }

  .feature-bg-{{ section.id }} .feature-bg-image-desktop {
    display: none;
  }

  .feature-bg-{{ section.id }} .feature-bg-image-mobile {
    display: block;
  }

  .feature-body-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 40px;
    margin-top: {{ features_mt_mobile }}px;
    position: relative;
    align-items: center;
    z-index: 2;
  }

  .feature-features-{{ section.id }} {    
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: {{ features_gap_mobile }}px;
  }

  .feature-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
  }


  .feature-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    overflow: visible !important;
    min-width: 0 !important;
    width: 100%;
  }

  .feature-features-desktop-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
  }

  .feature-features-grid-mobile-{{ section.id }} {
    grid-template-columns: repeat({{ cards_per_row }}, 1fr);
  }

  .feature-features-mobile-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
  }

  .feature-feature-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    padding: {{ feature_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ feature_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ feature_radius }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
    border: {{ feature_border_thickness }}px solid {{ feature_border_color }};
    background-color: {{ feature_bg_color }};
    align-items: {{ feature_horizontal_align_mobile }};
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1;
    height: 100%;
  }
  
  .feature-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;    
    text-align: {{ feature_align_mobile }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
    font-size: {{ title_size_mobile }}px;
    font-weight: 700;
    line-height: {{ title_height }}%;
    color: {{ title_color }};
  }
  
  .feature-text-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ feature_align_mobile }};
    margin-top: {{ text_mt_mobile }}px;    
  }

  .feature-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;    
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
    font-size: {{ text_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ text_height }}%;
    color: {{ text_color }};  
  }

  .feature-image-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    flex-direction: column;
  }

  .feature-image-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 70%;
    border: {{ image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ image_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .feature-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .feature-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    border: 0;
  }

  .feature-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .feature-bottom-mobile-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block;
  }

  
  .featured-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
    z-index: 1;
    position: unset !important;   
    margin: 0px auto !important;
    width: 100% !important;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 10px;
    margin-top: {{ dots_mt }}px !important; 
  }

  .featured-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet {
    width: {{ dots_size_mobile }}px !important;
    height: {{ dots_size_mobile }}px !important;
    border: 0px !important;
    background-color: {{ dots_color }} !important;
    opacity: 0.4 !important;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet.swiper-pagination-bullet-active {
    transform: scale(1.3) !important;
    opacity: 1 !important;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .feature-bg-{{ section.id }} .feature-bg-image-desktop {
      display: block;
    }

    .feature-bg-{{ section.id }} .feature-bg-image-mobile {
      display: none;
    }

    .feature-content-{{ section.id }} {
      align-items: {{ content_horizontal_align }};
    }

    .feature-feature-{{ section.id }} {    
      padding: {{ feature_padding_vertical }}px {{ feature_padding_horizontal }}px;   
      align-items: {{ feature_horizontal_align }};
    }

    .feature-bottom-mobile-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }

    .feature-features-desktop-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }

    .feature-features-mobile-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;
    }

    .feature-body-{{ section.id }} {
      grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr;
      margin-top: {{ features_mt }}px;
    }

    .feature-review-{{ section.id }} {
      justify-content: {{ content_horizontal_align }};
    }

    .feature-features-{{ section.id }} {
      gap: {{ features_gap }}px;
    }

    .feature-title-{{ section.id }} { 
      text-align: {{ feature_align }};
      font-size: {{ title_size }}px;
    }

    .feature-text-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ feature_align }};
      margin-top: {{ text_mt }}px;    
    }

    .feature-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ text_size }}px;
    }

    .feature-image-{{ section.id }} {
      width: 100%;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% if width == 'custom' %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif width == 'page' %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: var(--page-width);
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal > 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if title_custom %}
  <style>
    .feature-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ title_font.family }}, {{ title_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ title_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ title_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if text_custom %}
  <style>
    .feature-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ text_font.family }}, {{ text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if use_feature_effect %}
  <style>
    .feature-feature-wrapper-{{ section.id }}:after {
      content: "";
      position: absolute;
      z-index: 0;
      width: 100%;
      height: 100%;
      background-color: {{ feature_shadow_color }};
      border-radius: {{ feature_radius }}px;
      top: 8px;
      left: -8px;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .feature-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
  .feature-image-{{ section.id }} {
    aspect-ratio: 12/8;
  }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .feature-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 12/12;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .feature-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: auto;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media (min-width: 1024px) {
      .feature-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media (min-width: 1024px) {
      .feature-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/8;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media (min-width: 1024px) {
      .feature-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/12;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media (min-width: 1024px) {
      .feature-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: auto;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if dots_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .featured-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex !important;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .featured-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% for block in section.blocks %}
  {% case block.type %}
    {% when 'sub_heading' %}
      <style>
        {{  block.settings.sub_heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

        .feature-subheading-{{ block.id }} {
          align-items: center;
          gap: 12px;         
          margin-top: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_mt_mobile }}px;
          text-align: {{ content_align_mobile }};
          position: relative;
          z-index: 2;
        }

        .feature-subheading-{{ block.id }} * {          
          margin: 0;            
          font-size: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_size_mobile }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_height }}%;
          text-transform: unset;
          text-decoration: none;
          word-break: break-word;
        }          

        @media(min-width: 1024px) {
          .feature-subheading-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-top: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_mt }}px;
            text-align: {{ content_align }};
          }

          .feature-subheading-{{ block.id }} * {                
            font-size: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_size }}px;
          }  
        }
      </style>

      {% if block.settings.sub_heading_custom %}
        <style>
          .feature-subheading-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-family: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.sub_heading_font.fallback_families }};
            font-weight: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_font.weight }};
            font-style: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_font.style }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}

    {% when 'heading' %}
      <style>
        {{  block.settings.heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

        .feature-heading-{{ block.id }} {
          margin-top: {{ block.settings.heading_mt_mobile }}px;
          text-align: {{ content_align_mobile }};
          position: relative;
          z-index: 2;
        }

        .feature-heading-{{ block.id }} * {          
          margin: 0;            
          font-size: {{ block.settings.heading_size_mobile }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.heading_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.heading_height }}%;
          text-transform: unset;
          text-decoration: none;
          word-break: break-word;
        }          

        @media(min-width: 1024px) {
          .feature-heading-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-top: {{ block.settings.heading_mt }}px;
            text-align: {{ content_align }};
          }

          .feature-heading-{{ block.id }} * {                
            font-size: {{ block.settings.heading_size }}px;
          }  
        }
      </style>

      {% if block.settings.heading_custom %}
        <style>
          .feature-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-family: {{ block.settings.heading_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.heading_font.fallback_families }};
            font-weight: {{ block.settings.heading_font.weight }};
            font-style: {{ block.settings.heading_font.style }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}

    {% when 'button' %}  
      <style>
        {{  block.settings.button_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
        
        .feature-button-{{ block.id }} {
          align-items: center;
          justify-content: center;
          max-width: fit-content;
          gap: 10px;
          width: 100%;
          margin: 0;         
          margin-top: {{ block.settings.button_mt_mobile }}px;
          font-size: {{ block.settings.button_size_mobile }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.button_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.button_height }}%;
          text-align: center;
          text-transform: unset;
          text-decoration: none;
          padding: {{ block.settings.button_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ block.settings.button_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
          border-radius: {{ block.settings.button_radius }}px;
          transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
          background-color: transparent;
          border: 0px;
          cursor: pointer;
          font-weight: 700;
        }

        .feature-button-inner-{{ block.id }} {
          margin: 0px;
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          justify-content: center;
          gap: 10px;
          text-decoration: none;
        }

        .feature-button-{{ block.id }}:hover {
          color: {{ block.settings.button_hover_color }};
          transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
        }

        .feature-button-{{ block.id }} svg {
          width: 14px;
          height: 14px;
        }

        .feature-button-{{ block.id }} svg path {
          fill: {{ block.settings.button_color }};
          transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
        }

        .feature-button-{{ block.id }}:hover svg path {
          fill: {{ block.settings.button_hover_color }};
          transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
        }

        @media (min-width: 1024px) {
          .feature-button-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-top: {{ block.settings.button_mt }}px;
            padding: {{ block.settings.button_padding_vertical }}px {{ block.settings.button_padding_horizontal }}px;
            font-size: {{ block.settings.button_size }}px;
          }
        }
      </style>

      {% if block.settings.use_shadow %}
        <style>
          .feature-button-{{ block.id }}:hover {
            -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 8px 2px {{ block.settings.button_bg_color }};
            -moz-box-shadow: 0px 0px 8px 2px {{ block.settings.button_bg_color }};
            box-shadow: 0px 0px 8px 2px {{ block.settings.button_bg_color }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}  

      {% if block.settings.button_custom %}
        <style>
          .feature-button-{{ block.id }} {
            font-family: {{ block.settings.button_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.button_font.fallback_families }};
            font-weight: {{ block.settings.button_font.weight }};
            font-style: {{ block.settings.button_font.style }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}

      {% if block.settings.button_style == "non_outline" or block.settings.button_style == "non_outline_arrow" %}
        <style>
          .feature-button-{{ block.id }} {
            transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
            background-color: {{  block.settings.button_bg_color }};
          }
      
          .feature-button-{{ block.id }}:hover {
            transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
            background-color: {{  block.settings.button_bg_hover_color }};
          }
        </style>
      {% elsif block.settings.button_style == "outline" or block.settings.button_style == "outline_arrow" %}
        <style>          
          .feature-button-{{ block.id }} {
            transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
            background-color: {{  block.settings.button_bg_color }};
            border: {{  block.settings.button_border_thickness }}px solid {{  block.settings.button_border_color }};
          }
      
          .feature-button-{{ block.id }}:hover {
            transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
            background-color: {{  block.settings.button_bg_hover_color }};
            border: {{  block.settings.button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ block.settings. button_border_hover_color }};
          }
        </style>
      {% elsif block.settings.button_style == "link" %}
        <style>
          .feature-button-{{ block.id }} {
            padding: 0px !important;
            -webkit-box-shadow: none !important;
            -moz-box-shadow: none !important;
            box-shadow: none !important;
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}   

    {% when 'sticker' %}
      <style>
        .feature-sticker-{{ block.id }} {
          position: absolute;
          z-index: 3;
          left: {{ block.settings.horizontal_position_mobile }}%;
          top: {{ block.settings.vertical_position_mobile }}%;
          transform: translate(-{{ block.settings.horizontal_position_mobile }}%, -{{ block.settings.vertical_position_mobile}}%) rotate({{ block.settings.rotate_mobile }}deg);  
          width: {{ block.settings.sticker_width_mobile }}px;
        }

        .feature-sticker-{{ block.id }} img,
        .feature-sticker-{{ block.id }} svg {
          display: block;
          width: 100%;
          height: 100%;
          object-fit: cover;
        }

        .feature-sticker-{{ block.id }} svg path {
          stroke: {{ block.settings.sticker_color }};
        }
        @media(min-width: 1024px) {
          .feature-sticker-{{ block.id }} {
            left: {{ block.settings.horizontal_position }}%;
            top: {{ block.settings.vertical_position }}%;
            transform: translate(-{{ block.settings.horizontal_position }}%, -{{ block.settings.vertical_position}}%) rotate({{ block.settings.rotate }}deg);  
            width: {{ block.settings.sticker_width }}px;
          }
        }
      </style>

      {% if block.settings.hide_mobile %}
        <style>
          .feature-sticker-{{ block.id }} {
            display: none;
          }

          @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .feature-sticker-{{ block.id }} {
              display: block;
            }
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}
      
    {% else %}
      
  {% endcase %}
{% endfor %}

{% if sticker_animation == 'parallax' %}
  <style>
     .feature-sticker-{{ section.id }} {
        animation-name: floating;
        animation-duration: 4s;
        animation-iteration-count: infinite;
        animation-timing-function: ease-in-out;           
      }
      
      @keyframes floating {
        from{
          transform:translate(0,0);
        }
        65% {
          transform:translate(0,15px);
        } 
        to {
          transform:translate(0,0);
        }
      }
  </style>
{% endif %}

<div class="section-{{ section.id }} feature-{{ section.id }}" {% if background_style == 'solid' %}style="background-color:{{ background_color }};"{% elsif background_style == 'gradient' %} style="background-image: {{ background_gradient }};"{% endif %}>
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
      {% for block in section.blocks %}
        {% if block.type == 'sticker' %}
          {% if block.settings.custom_sticker != blank %}
            <div class="feature-sticker-{{ block.id }} feature-sticker-{{ section.id }}"  data-translateY="{{ block.settings.vertical_position }}" data-translateY-mobile="{{ block.settings.vertical_position_mobile }}">
              {%- liquid
                assign sizes = "100vw"                      
              -%}
              {{ block.settings.custom_sticker | image_url: width: 750 | image_tag:
                loading: 'lazy',
                width: block.settings.custom_sticker.width,
                height: block.settings.custom_sticker.height,
                sizes: sizes,
                widths: '375, 550, 750, 1100, 1500',
                alt: block.settings.custom_sticker.alt | escape
              }}     
            </div>
          {% else %}
            {% if block.settings.sticker == 'first_sticker' %}
              <div class="feature-sticker-{{ block.id }} feature-sticker-{{ section.id }}"  data-translateY="{{ block.settings.vertical_position }}" data-translateY-mobile="{{ block.settings.vertical_position_mobile }}">
                <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 500 115" fill="none">
                  <path d="M21 92.5253C37.5344 71.229 75.3651 29.9063 94.4127 34.9856C118.222 41.3349 130.127 98.0809 152.349 92.5253C174.571 86.9698 216.238 19.1126 240.048 22.2872C263.857 25.4618 256.317 91.7317 296.794 87.7634C337.27 83.7952 357.508 16.7317 392.429 22.2872C427.349 27.8428 421.397 79.4299 479.73 57.2078" stroke="white" stroke-width="30" stroke-linecap="round"/>
                </svg>
              </div>
            {% elsif block.settings.sticker == 'second_sticker' %}        
              <div class="feature-sticker-{{ block.id }} feature-sticker-{{ section.id }}"  data-translateY="{{ block.settings.vertical_position }}" data-translateY-mobile="{{ block.settings.vertical_position_mobile }}">
                <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 300 301" fill="none">
                  <path d="M19.7354 47.7158C36.7354 31.0491 73.2354 2.71581 83.2354 22.7158C95.7354 47.7158 9.23535 101.716 46.2354 111.216C83.2354 120.716 144.235 27.7158 162.735 47.7158C181.235 67.7158 24.7354 183.216 61.7354 203.216C98.7354 223.216 254.235 15.2158 279.235 63.2158C304.235 111.216 54.2354 246.716 119.235 280.716C171.235 307.916 247.569 222.716 279.235 176.716" stroke="white" stroke-width="24" stroke-linecap="round"/>
                </svg>
              </div>
            {% else %}
              <div class="feature-sticker-{{ block.id }} feature-sticker-{{ section.id }}"  data-translateY="{{ block.settings.vertical_position }}" data-translateY-mobile="{{ block.settings.vertical_position_mobile }}">
                <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 301 301" fill="none">
                  <path d="M30.4692 125.978C20.3026 93.4775 9.66922 30.5775 48.4692 38.9775C96.9692 49.4775 86.9692 87.4775 107.469 84.9775C127.969 82.4775 151.969 8.97748 176.469 23.9775C200.969 38.9775 169.969 66.4775 188.469 84.9775C206.969 103.478 248.969 34.9775 267.469 71.9775C285.969 108.978 196.469 143.978 213.969 165.478C231.469 186.978 279.969 171.478 279.969 208.978C279.969 238.978 235.969 269.144 213.969 280.478" stroke="white" stroke-width="24" stroke-linecap="round"/>
                </svg>
              </div>
            {% endif %}
          {% endif %}
        {% endif %}
      {% endfor %}
      {% if background_style == 'image' %}
        <div class="feature-bg-{{ section.id }}">
          
          {% if bg_image != blank %}
            {%- liquid
              assign image_class = "feature-bg-image-desktop"
              assign sizes = "100vw"
            -%}
            {{ bg_image | image_url: width: 3840 | image_tag:
              loading: 'lazy',
              width: bg_image.width,
              height: bg_image.height,
              sizes: sizes,
              class: image_class,
              widths: '2400, 3000, 3840',
              alt: bg_image.alt | escape
            }}
          {% endif %}

          {% if bg_image_mobile != blank %}
            {%- liquid
              assign image_class = "feature-bg-image-mobile"
              assign sizes_mobile = "(min-width: 750px) 50vw, 100vw"
            -%}
            {{ bg_image_mobile | image_url: width: 1500 | image_tag:
              loading: 'lazy',
              width: bg_image_mobile.width,
              height: bg_image_mobile.height,
              class: image_class,
              sizes: sizes_mobile,
              widths: '375, 550, 750, 1100, 1500, 1780, 2000, 3000, 3840',
              alt: bg_image_mobile.alt | escape
            }}
          {% endif %}

          {% if bg_image == blank and bg_image_mobile == blank %}
            {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
          {% endif %}

        </div>
      {% endif %}

      <div class="feature-content-{{ section.id }}">
        {% for block in section.blocks %}
          {% case block.type %}
            {% when 'sub_heading' %}  
              {% if block.settings.sub_heading != blank %}
                <div class="feature-subheading-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.sub_heading }}</div>
              {% endif %}  

            {% when 'heading' %}  
              {% if block.settings.heading != blank %}
                <div class="feature-heading-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.heading }}</div>
              {% endif %} 

            {% when 'button' %}
                {% if block.settings.button != blank %}                 
                  <{% if block.settings.url != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} {% if block.settings.open_in_new_tab %}target="_blank"{% endif %} class="feature-button-{{ block.id }}">
                    <p class="feature-button-inner-{{ block.id }}">
                      {{ block.settings.button }}
                      {% if block.settings.button_style == "non_outline_arrow" or block.settings.button_style == "outline_arrow" %}
                        <svg width="192" height="192" viewBox="0 0 192 192" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                          <path d="M187.827 98.7858C188.123 98.4749 188.123 98.4749 188.123 98.1761C188.419 97.8652 188.419 97.5663 188.704 97.5663C189 96.9566 189 96.6458 189 96.0361C189 95.4263 189 94.8166 188.704 94.5058C188.704 94.195 188.408 93.8961 188.123 93.5852C188.123 93.2744 187.827 93.2744 187.827 92.9755L103.287 4.21945C102.41 3.29889 101.533 3 100.668 3C99.791 3 98.6295 3.31083 98.0488 4.21945C97.1719 5.14 96.8872 6.06058 96.8872 6.96919C96.8872 7.88974 97.1833 9.10918 98.0488 9.7189L175.587 92.0539H6.79206C4.75371 92.0539 3 93.895 3 96.0351C3 98.1751 4.75365 100.016 6.79206 100.016H175.575L97.7543 182.042C96.2967 183.572 96.2967 186.322 97.7543 187.852C99.2119 189.383 101.831 189.383 103.288 187.852L187.827 98.7858Z" fill="black"></path>
                          <path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M188.607 97.5657C188.432 97.5657 188.365 97.6788 188.27 97.8382C188.211 97.9378 188.141 98.0554 188.027 98.1748C188.027 98.4734 188.027 98.4734 187.731 98.7839L103.281 187.759C101.825 189.287 99.2085 189.287 97.7524 187.759C96.2963 186.23 96.2963 183.483 97.7524 181.954L175.492 100.013L6.88489 100.013C4.8486 100.013 3.09677 98.1739 3.09677 96.036C3.09677 93.8982 4.84866 92.059 6.88489 92.059L175.504 92.059L98.0465 9.80878C97.182 9.19968 96.8862 7.9815 96.8862 7.0619C96.8862 6.15422 97.1706 5.2346 98.0465 4.315C98.6267 3.40732 99.787 3.0968 100.663 3.0968C101.527 3.0968 102.403 3.39539 103.279 4.315L187.731 92.9796C187.731 93.1274 187.804 93.2021 187.877 93.2774C187.952 93.3543 188.027 93.4319 188.027 93.5887C188.046 93.6098 188.066 93.6308 188.085 93.6518C188.338 93.9267 188.584 94.1935 188.606 94.4689C188.607 94.482 188.607 94.4951 188.607 94.5083C188.903 94.8188 188.903 95.4279 188.903 96.037C188.903 96.6461 188.903 96.9566 188.607 97.5657ZM191.489 93.2767C191.79 93.8661 191.89 94.4204 191.934 94.7363C192.001 95.2226 192 95.7194 192 95.9856L192 96.037C192 96.0544 192 96.0729 192 96.0926C192 96.3523 192.001 96.8096 191.924 97.2931C191.828 97.8884 191.64 98.41 191.393 98.9184L190.546 100.663H190.212C190.127 100.759 190.038 100.852 189.988 100.905L189.974 100.92L105.527 189.891C102.85 192.701 98.1865 192.704 95.51 189.895C94.1476 188.464 93.5636 186.587 93.5636 184.857C93.5636 183.128 94.1468 181.252 95.5071 179.822M191.489 93.2767C191.316 92.7908 191.078 92.4357 190.938 92.2406C190.903 92.1912 190.866 92.142 190.828 92.0939V91.7408L105.522 2.17912C104.076 0.661813 102.397 0 100.663 0C99.3914 0 97.0569 0.401401 95.6212 2.37737C94.3151 3.83819 93.7895 5.45521 93.7895 7.0619C93.7895 8.26663 94.1183 10.6061 95.9608 12.111L168.333 88.9622L6.88489 88.9622C2.9981 88.9622 0 92.3316 0 96.036C0 99.7405 2.99801 103.11 6.88489 103.11L168.285 103.11" fill="black"></path>
                          <path d="M169.5 104L16.5 102.5V90H171L97.5 10.5V7L107.5 4.5C131.167 29.6667 180.2 81.5 187 87.5C193.8 93.5 191.5 99 189.5 101L105.5 184L94 181.5L169.5 104Z" fill="black"></path>
                        </svg>
                      {% endif %}
                    </p>
                  </{% if block.settings.url != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>     
                {% endif %}              
            {% else %}            
          {% endcase %}
        {% endfor %}
      </div>

      <div class="feature-body-{{ section.id }}">
        <div class="feature-features-{{ section.id }} feature-features-desktop-{{ section.id }}">
          {% for block in section.blocks %}    
            {% if block.type == 'feature' %}       
              {% if block.settings.column == 'first' %}
                <div class="feature-feature-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
                  <div class="feature-feature-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.title != blank %}
                      <p class="feature-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.title }}</p>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                      <div class="feature-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</div>
                    {% endif %}
                  </div> 
                </div>               
              {% endif %}
            {% endif %}           
          {% endfor %}
        </div>
        <div class="feature-image-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
          <div class="feature-image-{{ section.id }}">    
            {% if image != blank %} 
              {%- capture sizes -%}(min-width: {{ content_width }}px) {{ content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 }}px, (min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), calc((100vw - 50px) / 2){%- endcapture -%}
                {{ image | image_url: width: 1000 | image_tag:
                  loading: loading_attribute,
                  width: image.width,
                  height: image.height,
                  sizes: sizes,
                  widths: '750, 1070, 1500'
                }}
            {% else %}
              {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
            {% endif %}    
          </div>
        </div>
        <div class="feature-features-{{ section.id }} feature-features-desktop-{{ section.id }}">
          {% for block in section.blocks %}          
            {% if block.type == 'feature' %}       
              {% if block.settings.column == 'second' %}
                <div class="feature-feature-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
                  <div class="feature-feature-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.title != blank %}
                      <p class="feature-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.title }}</p>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                      <div class="feature-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</div>
                    {% endif %}
                  </div> 
                </div>
              {% endif %}
            {% endif %}          
          {% endfor %}
        </div>
        {% if use_slider_mobile %}
          <div class="feature-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} feature-features-mobile-{{ section.id }}">
            <div class="feature-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper">
              <div class="swiper-wrapper">
                {% for block in section.blocks %}          
                  {% if block.type == 'feature' %}   
                    <div class="feature-feature-wrapper-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">     
                      <div class="feature-feature-{{ section.id }}">
                        {% if block.settings.title != blank %}
                          <p class="feature-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.title }}</p>
                        {% endif %}
                        {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                          <div class="feature-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</div>
                        {% endif %}
                      </div>       
                    </div>     
                  {% endif %}          
                {% endfor %}
              </div>            
            </div>
            <div class="featured-pagination-{{ section.id }} swiper-pagination"></div>   
          </div>
        {% else %}
          <div class="feature-features-{{ section.id }} feature-features-mobile-{{ section.id }} feature-features-grid-mobile-{{ section.id }}">
            {% for block in section.blocks %}          
              {% if block.type == 'feature' %}   
                <div class="feature-feature-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">     
                  <div class="feature-feature-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.title != blank %}
                      <p class="feature-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.title }}</p>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                      <div class="feature-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</div>
                    {% endif %}
                  </div>       
                </div>     
              {% endif %}          
            {% endfor %}
          </div>
        {% endif %}
      </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initFeature48() {    
    const slider = new Swiper(`.feature-slider-{{ section.id }}`, {
      speed: 300,
      loop: true,
      slidesPerView: 1,
      spaceBetween: {{ features_gap_mobile }},
      pagination: {
        el: `.featured-pagination-{{ section.id }}`,
        type: "bullets",
        clickable: true,
      }
    });

    {% if sticker_animation == 'rotate' %}
      const stickers = document.querySelectorAll('.feature-sticker-{{ section.id }}');
      let lastScrollTop = window.pageYOffset || document.documentElement.scrollTop;
      let rotationDegrees = 0;

      function handleScrollRotate() {
        const currentScrollTop = window.pageYOffset || document.documentElement.scrollTop;
        const deltaScroll = currentScrollTop - lastScrollTop;
        const rotationSpeed = 0.1;


        rotationDegrees += deltaScroll * rotationSpeed;

        stickers.forEach(sticker => {
          let stickerIMG = sticker.querySelector('img');
          let stickerSVG = sticker.querySelector('svg');

          if(stickerIMG) {
            stickerIMG.style.transform = `rotate(${rotationDegrees}deg)`
          }

          if(stickerSVG) {
            stickerSVG.style.transform = `rotate(${rotationDegrees}deg)`
          }
        });

        lastScrollTop = currentScrollTop;
      }

      const featureSection = document.querySelector('.feature-{{ section.id }}');
      const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
        entries.forEach(entry => {
          if (entry.isIntersecting) {
            window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScrollRotate);
          } else {
            window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScrollRotate);
            stickers.forEach(sticker => {
              let stickerIMG = sticker.querySelector('img');
              let stickerSVG = sticker.querySelector('svg');

              if(stickerIMG) {
                stickerIMG.style.transform = `rotate(0deg)`
              }

              if(stickerSVG) {
                stickerSVG.style.transform = `rotate(0deg)`
              }
            });
            rotationDegrees = 0;
          }
        });
      }, { threshold: 0 });

      observer.observe(featureSection);
    {% endif %}
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initFeature48);

  if (Shopify.designMode) {
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initFeature48);
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initFeature48);
  }
</script>
